description: Hinata Hideki is a bright, dependable boy who is the closest to http://anidb.net/ch12094 [Otonashi]. He always tries to save his friends if he can and is a reliable force in the team. He and http://anidb.net/ch15118 [Yui] constantly irritate one another on a daily basis, but deep down, he cares for http://anidb.net/ch15118 [Yui], as shown when he helps her pass on. He is a talented baseball player. He nicknamed http://anidb.net/ch12092 [Yuri] as Yurippe when they co-founded the http://anidb.net/ch15364 [SSS] as he did not feel comfortable calling her http://anidb.net/ch12092 [Yuri], because his mother has the same name.
name: Hinata Hideki
